title: BRIEF-Kleos Space SA Received Confirmation That Kleos Scouting Mission Will Launch
text:
BRIEF-Kleos Space SA Received Confirmation That Kleos Scouting Mission Will Launch

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 21, 2019 03:54)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Kleos Space SA Received Confirmation That Kleos Scouting Mission Will Launch Oct 21 (Reuters) - Kleos Space SA : * RECEIVED CONFIRMATION THAT KLEOS SCOUTING MISSION WILL LAUNCH ON A PSLV ROCKET FROM CHENNAI, INDIA IN DECEMBER 2019 * RECEIVED CONFIRMATION THAT KLEOS SCOUTING MISSION WILL LAUNCH ON A PSLV ROCKET FROM CHENNAI, INDIA IN DECEMBER 2019

BRIEF-Kleos Space SA Received Confirmation That Kleos Scouting Mission Will Launch
description: BRIEF-Kleos Space SA Received Confirmation That Kleos Scouting Mission Will Launch
